currency.description: Currency of the value of the event, in 3-letter ISO 4217 format. * If you set value then currency is required for revenue metrics to be computed accurately.

value.description: The monetary value of the event. * value is typically required for meaningful reporting. If you mark the event as a key event then it's recommended you set value. * currency is required if you set value.

disqualified_lead_reason.description: The reason a lead was marked as disqualified.
